594.sentence: + / - sound quality was good but it was going to take some tweakings with settings to try to make it great .

595.sentence: - the software that came with it was tough to load .

597.sentence: the top did not fit well into the unit . ( felt defective )

598.sentence: - the cover that came with it did n't fit very well

601.sentence: i decided to save the $ $ and opted for the zen xtra ... and i was not disappointed .

602.sentence: the player is intuitive and outputs great sound quality .

603.sentence: the player is intuitive and outputs great sound quality .

604.sentence: navigation is easy and i found that syncing files from the player to the computer ( and vice versa ) was easy too .

605.sentence: navigation is easy and i found that syncing files from the player to the computer ( and vice versa ) was easy too .

606.sentence: many have complained about the software included but in my opinion it 's easy to use and effective .

607.sentence: i love this player and am extremely happy with my decision .

608.sentence: the construction of the player is the cheesiest i have ever seen -- the front panel refused to clip in correctly , leaving a noticeable gap between the panel and base of the player .

609.sentence: i 'm not willing to accept shoddy construction on something i paid over 250 dollars for .

610.sentence: the price / performance looked just right .

611.sentence: i 've had this thing just over a month and the headphone jack has already come loose .

612.sentence: i fully expect it to go bad again in the same or some other way in the next 6 months because , as other reviewers have pointed out , the construction is pretty flimsy .

613.sentence: like other reviewers , installation was hell .

614.sentence: about 10 % of the time it can 't find the device when i attach it to my pc .

615.sentence: after i had it a couple weeks , it got into a state where it could never find the device , no matter how often i rebooted my pc , reset the device , reloaded drivers , etc , etc. creative 's online support was no help at all .

616.sentence: in fact , i 'd have to rate it among the worst i 've ever encountered .

617.sentence: to my amazement , even that process was error-prone .

618.sentence: it took several days of attempts before things finally " worked " again and i have n't a clue why .

619.sentence: i did buy the notmad software a week ago and found that a vast improvement .

620.sentence: my gut tells me the nomad will in the long run be , at best , a 40gb portable hard drive , albeit one on which i can 't create folders , or , at worst , a very expensive lesson in companies never to buy products from again ( i have their audigy sound card and find it in many ways equally frustrating ) .

621.sentence: i will never buy a creative product again .

622.sentence: i purchased a jukebox , it got fried while being recharged , they asked for $ 20usd just to look at it and said that they would charge me for repaing the damned thing .

623.sentence: 1 ) great sound ( > 98db signal-to-noise ratio beats ipod 's " unspecified " ratio ) and good power output allow the zen xtra to drive large head-phones as well as external speakers .

627.sentence: 2 ) the player user interface ( ui ) is intuitive to use , and allows easy navigation of a large or small collection .

628.sentence: 2 ) the player user interface ( ui ) is intuitive to use , and allows easy navigation of a large or small collection .

629.sentence: 3 ) the nomad explorer ( winxp style interface ) works well to transfer files back and forth to use the nomad as an external although the tech support web-site states that the primary intended purpose of the player is as a player .

630.sentence: the nomad explorer provide most of the functionality offered by 3rd party programs like notmad .

631.sentence: 4 ) usb 2.0 means fast data transfers ( 1 song / sec ! ).

632.sentence: 5 ) the cheap , user-replaceable battery ( $ 50 from creative ) is a great advantage over the ipod 's battery which costs $ 100 to replace .

633.sentence: 6 ) excellent battery life - 14 hours beats ipod 's .

634.sentence: 7 ) chic look and good build - the player comes in a compact form with a metal face plate .

636.sentence: i use it primarily in the provided protective case although i have dropped it about 3 feet from my desk ( by accident ) as well as have played it outdoors in - 30 fahrenheit weather ( by design ) and it has continued to work fine .

637.sentence: 8 ) creative mediasource , although not as sleek looking as windows mediaplayer , is effective in organizing your collection and is linked to a good cddb service ( gracenotes ).

638.sentence: i do n't always care for gracenotes ' genre listings but it allows easy editing of id3 tags .

639.sentence: b. fast mediasource cd ripping - takes about 40 seconds for a cd on my pentium 4 pc ( 2.4 ghz with 1gb ram ) with 52x drive .

640.sentence: c. i do love audio sync which allows a one-click synchronization between the player and the music collection on the computer .

641.sentence: 9 ) wake-up feature that allows you to set up the player to wake up and play selected music at a specified time .

642.sentence: 10 ) multiple play modes - tracks in order of album , shuffle , etc. , is standard on all jukebox players but worth noting that the zen xtra is not deficient in this matter .

643.sentence: 11 ) minimal pause between songs - less than that on other devices - good achievement for a hard-drive based player

644.sentence: 12 ) big storage - my entire cd collection in one small device ( 5717 songs , 491 albums and counting ) !

645.sentence: 1 ) player is not plug and play - need to install nomad explorer first and mediasource to transfer files and i had to be patient as i was used to winxp detecting the player and dragging and dropping the music files into it .

646.sentence: 2 ) music organization is based on id3 ( by genre , artist , album , etc. ) and this can be a problem for older downloaded music files with missing or incorrect id3 information .

647.sentence: 3 ) folders cannot be created for the audio files .

648.sentence: 4 ) no fm or voice recording - these would have been nice extras .

649.sentence: 4 ) no fm or voice recording - these would have been nice extras .

650.sentence: 5 ) lack of good accessories - this is more of an oversight of creative 's marketing .

651.sentence: 6 ) the case occludes the display screen when it is closed .

652.sentence: 7 ) some people have problems with the flip switch on the bottom that releases the player cover - has not been an issue for me and is immaterial if you use the case as the case covers the switch .
